sentences.en: Along with enthusiasm, sumo commands a large measure of reverence.
sentences.cn: 除了狂热之外, 相扑还博得民众普遍的崇敬.

sentences.en: Barbara and I went to see this outdoor sumo match at a Shinto Shrine in Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 今天芭芭拉和我来到了东京神社观赏户外相扑比赛.

sentences.en: I stand here among these, and you would think that sumo is as popular as ever.
sentences.cn: 我站在这些人中.你或许会想相扑仍和以前一样受欢迎.

sentences.en: I think if more Japanese wrestlers did well, more Japanese would watch sumo.
sentences.cn: 我想如果有更多表现出色的摔跤手的话, 就会有更多的民众观看相扑.

sentences.en: Jock is usually popular, but I do not know about the sumo wrestlers.
sentences.cn: 运动选手总是很受欢迎, 但我不知道相扑队是不是.

sentences.en: Make use of the top and bottom or so direction key to move a sumo hand.
sentences.cn: 利用上下左右方向键来移动相扑手.

sentences.en: Sumo wrestlers are large heavy men.
sentences.cn: 相扑摔跤队员都非常肥胖.

sentences.en: Thai kick boxing or Japanese sumo?
The baby with the loudest howls is declared the winner by the sumo judge.
sentences.cn: 哭声最响亮的婴儿被评委宣布为比赛冠军.

sentences.en: Top-ranking sumo wrestlers attain superstar status.
sentences.cn: 顶尖的相扑选手可获得超级明星的地位。

sentences.en: Two tickets to the sumo tournament. You deserve a break today.
sentences.cn: 两张相扑的门票, 你该休息一天.

sentences.en: We went to a store that caters to sumo wrestlers andbig and tall men in Japan.
sentences.cn: 我们来到一家针对相扑选手专卖特大尺码的服饰店.

sentences.en: What do you feed a sumo wrestler?
Wrestlers train in sumo stables here.
sentences.cn: 相扑选手在这里集中训练.

trans.tran_en: a Japanese form of  wrestling  , done by men who are very large
